墜.definition: to fall; to drop; to weigh down

墜入.definition: to drop into; to fall into

墜子.definition: weight; pendant; same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]; ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]

墜樓.definition: to fall off or jump off a building

墜毀.definition: (of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash

墜海.definition: to fall into the ocean; to crash into the ocean

墜琴.definition: same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]

墜胡.definition: two-stringed bowed instrument; also called 墜琴|坠琴[zhui4 qin2]
